CustomField.formula: IF( Site__c = "AU", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 1000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 2599), "NSW", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 2619,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 2899), "NSW", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 2921,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 2999), "NSW", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 0200,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 0299), "ACT", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 2600,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 2618), "ACT", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 2900,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 2920), "ACT", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 3000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 3999), "VIC", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 8000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 8999), "VIC", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 4000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 4999), "QLD", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 9000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 9999), "QLD", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 5000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 5999), "SA", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 6000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 6999), "WA", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 7000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 7999), "TAS", IF(AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 0800,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 0999), "NT", "Other")))))))))))))), IF( AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 0000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 6999), "North Island", IF( AND( Postcode_from_PIF__c >= 7000,Postcode_from_PIF__c <= 9999), "South Island", "Other" )) )
CustomField.label: State From PIF Postcode
